foreignData.name: Küste der Chromsee
foreignData.text:
Die Küste der Chromsee kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder weniger andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {U}.

foreignData.name: Costa de Cromo Marítimo
foreignData.text:
La Costa de Cromo Marítimo entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles otras dos o menos tierras.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.

foreignData.name: Côte de Chromemer
foreignData.text:
La Côte de Chromemer arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez deux autres terrains ou moins.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U}.

foreignData.name: Costa del Mar di Cromo
foreignData.text:
La Costa del Mar di Cromo entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli al massimo altre due terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U}.

foreignData.name: 金属海の沿岸
foreignData.text:
他の、あなたがコントロールしている土地が３つ以上であるかぎり、金属海の沿岸はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{W}か{U}を加える。

foreignData.name: 금속바다 해변
foreignData.text:
금속바다 해변은 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이하로 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {W} 또는 {U}를 추가한다.

foreignData.name: Costa do Mar de Cromo
foreignData.text:
Costa do Mar de Cromo entra no campo de batalha virada, a menos que você controle dois outros terrenos ou menos.
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {U}.

foreignData.name: Побережье Морского Хрома
foreignData.text:
Побережье Морского Хрома выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если под вашим контролем есть не менее трех других земель.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {U}.

foreignData.name: 铬亮海岸
foreignData.text:
除非由你操控的其他地数量为两个或更少，否则铬亮海岸须横置进战场。
{T}：加{W}或{U}。

foreignData.name: 鉻亮海岸
foreignData.text:
除非由你操控的其他地數量為兩個或更少，否則鉻亮海岸須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{W}或{U}。

name: Seachrome Coast
originalText:
Seachrome Coast enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

rulings.text: If one of these lands is your first, second, or third land, it enters the battlefield untapped. If you control three or more other lands, however, it enters the battlefield tapped.

If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands (due to Oblivion Sower or Warp World, perhaps), it doesn’t take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.

text:
Seachrome Coast enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
